articles.title: Amid pandemic, large wedding ceremonies 'our most problematic issue' for Palestinians - CBC.ca
articles.description: Large ceremonies are customary in Palestinian society, where weddings bind the couple to each other — and to the community. In the absence of physical distancing measures, weddings have proved an incubator for the novel coronavirus.
articles.content: Back in the spring, it seemed the Palestinians were getting the coronavirus pandemic under control. Despite limited resources and a struggling health service, by the end of May, they saw the fruits o… [+7035 chars]

articles.title: In England, coronavirus limits on social gatherings may last through Christmas - q107.com
articles.description: New limits for both indoor and outdoor gatherings, which will be enforceable by law, are aimed at keeping a lid on a recent sharp spike in new cases.

articles.title: A Toronto woman contracted coronavirus in March. She's still exhibiting symptoms - Global News
articles.description: Long-haulers are patients who were diagnosed with the virus, but still exhibit symptoms weeks or months after the expected recovery time — even after they've stopped testing positive for COVID-19.
articles.content:
